message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $120 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $170?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
